titles.title: Truth in Poultry Labeling Act of 1994
A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations concerning use of the term "fresh" in the labeling of poultry, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9933-9934)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 7/27/1994--Introduced. Truth in Poultry Labeling Act of 1994 - Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to issue final regulations with respect to fresh poultry labeling.
